special_text:
Fable [i](You may trigger the chapters of this saga in any order. You choose which chapter to use as you place lore counters on it.)[/i]
I – Surveil 1.
II – Draw two cards, then discard a card unless there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
III – At the beginning of your next end step, untap up to two lands you control.
